title: in the form of plot / plots equivalent to 20% plot area for constructing EWS / LIG tenements to be handed over to MHADA
clause_text: in the form of plot / plots equivalent to 20% plot area for constructing EWS / LIG tenements to be handed over to MHADA. Within this 20% area, proportionate road and recreational open space area of this 20% space, shall be included, OR
section: For the sub-division or layout of the land :-
